post.body: You can sing "tall soy cafe mocha two shots with light whip" to the tune of The Twelve Days of Christmas. I know cuz I tried it.
I'm planning the menu for Christmas dinner but so far only have "Bacardi Rum Cake" written down.
Finished our Christmas letter and am addressing envelopes now. Can't believe how MANY boxes of unused Xmas cards I found in the attic....
I have just finished my last Statistics test! I can do Regression analysis now... will I ever need to? That's the question!
Last week of Statistics class! Yay! We only have to get through Regression and Confidence Intervals.....
Did you know you can buy christmas tunes from The Partridge Family in the iTunes store?
Got a Blu-Ray DVD player and now know why some are cheaper than others.
Last night I realized my husband based his character development on Maxwell Smart. "Missed it, by THAT much!"
I am going to teach my Pilates Mind & Body class today on the ligaments of the spine. Woo-hoo! I promise to make it fascinating.
I taught my Pilates Mind/Body class how the facet joints work yesterday. They liked it! Then we did Gyrokinesis....
Tip: Never let your 8-year old watch a National Geographic documentary on mummies just before bedtime.
Am still avoiding my Statistics homework -- multi-way ANOVA.
Traffic was so bad that I was late for my Group Pilates Reformer class. Had to lead it by speakerphone for 15 minutes!
Got a sore throat - wah! Must take 5 little black licorice -flavored Gan Mao Ling. Dunno what it is...but it works!
Another day, another 50 cents. The economy, y'know.
Home from picking up Thomas from school. He's doing his 4s multiplication sheet and I am doing a one-way ANOVA. I WILL pass this class!
Statistics - ARGH!!!!!!!!!
Listen to NPR's This American Life -- this is a must-do!
Getting ready to drive to Santa Cruz -- beautiful day today!
Finished my statistics test, thank God.... whose idea was this anyway?
Amish Friendship Bread should be called Cinnamon-Sugar Cake. Or maybe Cinnamon Twinkie Cake. Or maybe Hyperglycemic Episode Cake.
I just worked through household bills and combined, consolidated, and canceled -- I'm saving $100/mo. now!
Eggs benedict, anyone? No? Only me? Well okay.
We did pork tenderloin stew with tomatillos for dinner tonight! It's such fun cooking for 7 instead of 2! Happy times but miss my big sis!
German chocolate brownies with coconut cream cheese frosting! Wow.....
